title: Auction Event Service
descript: Auction Event Service is a nano service of D20 Blockchain Service, which provides the consensus mechanism of D20 Blockchain.
AES provides blind auctions for two type of services, Next AES and Block AES.
Winner of Next AES is the next auction event service provider.
Winners of Block AES upgrade the D20 Blockchain tree in specific dimensions.

children.title: Event Cycle
descript: A Cycle of AES is ‘180 000’ milliseconds and contains 6 phases.
Event cycle is a time table of the event's expected operations.

children.title: Event Service
descript: The main service is AES, auction event service, which provides the competition for two types of services

children.content: nAES, next auction event service or next AES
bAES, D20 Block auction event service

children.title: Party
descript: AES party is a group of Cessor Nodes, which handles the event services.
AES party provides configured structure to perform event tasks

children.content: Fault tolerated leadership
Reliable network infrastructure
Concurrent processing capacity to compute transactions
Storage capability
Trusted investors

children.title: Event party
descript: AES, theoretically, needs three types of parties

children.content: AES Administrative party
nAES Bidder party ( next AES Administration Candidate )
bAES Bidder party ( next Dk Block Candidate )
AES needs at least one nAES candidate party, otherwise the period has to extend.
AES Administrative party is responsible for all challenges during the event.
AES Administrative party can be candidate party for nAES or/and bAES.

children.title: AES flags
descript: AES flag is a done flag allocated to a party member for a successfully provided service by the party.
Flag owner can delegate it to its party/parties for particular purposes.
The ownership of an AES flag is atomic and can not be changed.
AES releases four types of AES flags

children.content: ADMIN flag is allocated to AES administrative party leader
BLOCK flag is allocated to bAES party leader
LORD flag is allocated to event services party lords
INVEST flag is allocated to event services party investors

children.title: AES credit
descript: AES credit indicates all obtained flags by the AES administrative party.
AES credit has to be greater than 50% of the latest AES credit to reach the consensus.
AES administrative party collects the flags via three types of resources

children.content: Delegated flags of AES administrative party
Inherited flags of latest AES administrative party
Delegated flags of event services candidate party
